pages.text: Eidolon is a magic themed mod with a dark perspective around necromancy and soul manipulation but the rewards can be strong.

Toss your Ars Ecclesia tome to a witch and let her scribble a new mystical sign in it.  Place down at least 6 connected Wooden Altars with a Straw Effigy on top and while in front of it, every day you can, try to say your prayer  from your Mystical Signs chapter tab (click 3 times on the Wicked Sign and click the Chant button that appears). This gains you favor and a new chant!

Some of the Rituals can change the time of day, summon minor monsters, and keeps monsters away from your base.  With the Artifice knowledge you can craft a varierty of gear/weaponry with unique abilities.  Early on you can even craft Enchanted Ash, while is placed like Redstone but prevents mobs from crossing it.
